name: BOXXART
description:
Vergil is in the middle of a dodgeball tournament with his team, The Rovers, and is about to enter the finals. He sees his fans' comments and is committed to not letting them down. To train his reflexes, he downloads an app called BOXXART in his phone. Through this app, he enters a virtual world to where he is augmented in his abilities. However, he will also have to avoid highly fast projectiles launched from an automatized wall, practicing and improving his reaction skills, attrition and speed.

The game presents rather stylistic sci-fi design, that might not only resemble a lot of all time sci-fi favorite settings but also give its own flavor. It comes package with thrilling action and gameplay, that will for sure bring a satisfying challenge most players. 

DISCLAIMER: All assets used are made by me or ones free to use by the public (mainly the sfx)
